mapper.insert: insert pms_position (job_title, company_name, city_id, job_description, industry, position_type, min_salary, max_salary, creator_id) VALUES (#{pmsPosition.jobTitle}, #{pmsPosition.companyName}, #{pmsPosition.cityId}, #{pmsPosition.jobDescription}, #{pmsPosition.industry}, #{pmsPosition.positionType}, #{pmsPosition.minSalary}, #{pmsPosition.maxSalary}, #{userId})
mapper.select: select * from pms_position where suspend <> 1 order by create_time desc
select p.*, pap.create_time as pap_time from pms_position p left join pms_applied_position pap on p.id = pap.position_id where pap.user_id = #{userId} order by pap_time Desc
